summary: Fang Shijie is found as a baby in the garbage and raised at a martial arts academy. With the help of a man, he gets into college and is promoted to the basketball championship as he searches for his real parents.
cast: Jay Chou|Eric Tsang|Gang Wang|Charlene Choi|Bo-lin Chen|Chu-he Chen|Lan Cheung|James Z. Feng|Bo Huang|Eddy Ko|Li-Chun Lee|Ka-Yan Leung|Ken Lin|Will Liu|Man-Tat Ng|Kenneth Tsang|Jacky Tsung-hsien Wu|Ni Yan
title: Kung fu basket
